name: Keep Going (Martin Mauersics)
description:
Drop to the next floor, evade dark adversaries, and try to reach the deepest level of the abyss.

Keep Going is a fast-paced reaction-skill game made in less than eight hours on Mi'pu'mi day with the jam theme "Weltschmerz".

InputActionWASD | Arrows
Move ⇄ ⇵RRestart ↺

Music:
by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.html?genre=Jazz)
